evidence.claim: Summit Engineered Automation utilizes AWS for cloud deployment.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards for health data security.
They implement HL7 standards for health data exchange.
Summit Engineered Automation's platform supports FHIR for interoperability.
Utilization of EDI transaction sets for streamlined healthcare workflows.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engaging in X12 transactions or API automation.
